description: Walnut stuffed prunes are often enjoyed around Christmas time in Ukraine, but are delicious at any time of year.
name: Walnut Stuffed Prunes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the sugar, red wine and 250ml of hot water together in a saucepan and whisk until the sugar dissolves. Add the prunes and bring to the boil. Remove the prunes from the syrup and dry on kitchen paper.
Set aside to cool for up to an hour. Tip the walnuts into a large dry pan on medium heat and toast for 4 minutes, tossing regularly.
Stuff each prune with half of a toasted walnut. Divide the prunes between 4 serving dishes and top with sour cream. Place in the fridge for 2 hours and serve.
